text: "Michelle" is a song by English rock band the Beatles. It was first released on the band's 1965 album Rubber Soul. It was mainly written by Paul McCartney, with some parts written by John Lennon. It is a love ballad and some of the words are in French. == Personnel == According to Walter Everett: *Paul McCartney – lead vocal, backing vocal, acoustic guitar, bass guitar *John Lennon – backing vocal, classical guitar *George Harrison – backing vocal, acoustic guitar, lead guitar *Ringo Starr – drums ==Notes== ==References== ==Sources== * * * * * Category:The Beatles songs Category:1965 songs Category:1960s ballads Category:Grammy Award-winning songs Category:Pop ballads
title: Michelle (song)
